member.summary: .Net implementation of the compound stream.

member.summary: Stream position.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.#ctor(Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundFile,Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.DirectoryEntry)
member.summary: Initializes new instance of the stream.
member.param: Parent file object.
Entry that describes this stream item.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies count bytes from buffer to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Sets the position within the current stream.
member.param: A byte offset relative to the origin parameter.
A value of type SeekOrigin indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
member.returns: The new position within the current stream.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the length of the current stream.
member.param: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.Length
member.summary: Gets the length in bytes of the stream. Read-only.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position within the current stream.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.CompoundStreamDirect.Flush
member.summary: Causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying compound file.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGTY
member.summary: The STGTY enumeration values are used in the type member of the STATSTG structure to indicate the type of the storage element.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGTY.STGTY_STORAGE
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a storage object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGTY.STGTY_STREAM
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a stream object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGTY.STGTY_LOCKBYTES
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a byte-array object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGTY.STGTY_PROPERTY
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a property storage object.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STREAM_SEEK
member.summary: The STREAM_SEEK enumeration values specify the origin from which to calculate the new seek-pointer location.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STREAM_SEEK.STREAM_SEEK_SET
member.summary: The new seek pointer is an offset relative to the beginning of the stream. In this case, the dlibMove parameter is the new seek position relative to the beginning of the stream.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STREAM_SEEK.STREAM_SEEK_CUR
member.summary: The new seek pointer is an offset relative to the current seek pointer location. In this case, the dlibMove parameter is the signed displacement from the current seek position.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STREAM_SEEK.STREAM_SEEK_END
member.summary: The new seek pointer is an offset relative to the end of the stream. In this case, the dlibMove parameter is the new seek position relative to the end of the stream.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.LOCKTYPE
member.summary: The LOCKTYPE enumeration values indicate the type of locking requested for the specified range of bytes.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.LOCKTYPE.LOCK_WRITE
member.summary: If this lock is granted, the specified range of bytes can be opened and read any number of times, but writing to the locked range is prohibited except for the owner who granted this lock.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.LOCKTYPE.LOCK_EXCLUSIVE
member.summary: If this lock is granted, writing to the specified range of bytes is prohibited except by the owner granted this lock.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.LOCKTYPE.LOCK_ONLYONCE
member.summary: If this lock is granted, no other LOCK_ONLYONCE lock can be obtained on the range. Usually this lock type is an alias for some other lock type. Thus, specific implementations can have additional behavior associated with this lock type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM
member.summary: The STGM enumeration values are used in the IStorage, IStream, and IPropertySetStorage interfaces. These elements are often combined using an OR operator.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_READ
member.summary: Indicates that the object is read-only, meaning that modifications cannot be made.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_WRITE
member.summary: STGM_WRITE lets you save changes to the object, but does not permit access to its data.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_READWRITE
member.summary: STGM_READWRITE allows you to both access and modify an object's data.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_SHARE_DENY_NONE
member.summary: Specifies that subsequent openings of the object are not denied read or write access. If no flag from the sharing group is specified, this flag is assumed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_SHARE_DENY_READ
member.summary: Prevents others from subsequently opening the object in STGM_READ mode. It is typically used on a root storage object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_SHARE_DENY_WRITE
member.summary: Prevents others from subsequently opening the object for STGM_WRITE or STGM_READWRITE access.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_SHARE_EXCLUSIVE
member.summary: Prevents others from subsequently opening the object in any mode. In transacted mode, sharing of STGM_SHARE_DENY_WRITE or STGM_SHARE_EXCLUSIVE can significantly improve performance since they don't require snapshotting.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_PRIORITY
member.summary: Opens the storage object with exclusive access to the most recently committed version.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_CREATE
member.summary: Indicates that an existing storage object or stream should be removed before the new one replaces it.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_CONVERT
member.summary: Creates the new object while preserving existing data in a stream named "Contents".

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_FAILIFTHERE
member.summary: Causes the create operation to fail if an existing object with the specified name exists.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_DIRECT
member.summary: In direct mode, each change to a storage or stream element is written as it occurs.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_TRANSACTED
member.summary: In transacted mode, changes are buffered and written only if an explicit commit operation is called.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_NOSCRATCH
member.summary: In transacted mode, a temporary scratch file is usually used to save modifications until the Commit method is called.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_NOSNAPSHOT
member.summary: This flag is used when opening a storage object with STGM_TRANSACTED and without STGM_SHARE_EXCLUSIVE or STGM_SHARE_DENY_WRITE.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_SIMPLE
member.summary: STGM_SIMPLE is a mode that provides a much faster implementation of a compound file in a limited, but frequently used case.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_DIRECT_SWMR
member.summary: The STGM_DIRECT_SWMR supports direct mode for single-writer, multireader file operations.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGM.STGM_DELETEONRELEASE
member.summary: Indicates that the underlying file is to be automatically destroyed when the root storage object is released.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGFMT
member.summary: The STGFMT enumeration values specify the format of a storage object and are used in the StgCreateStorageEx and StgOpenStorageEx functions in the STGFMT parameter.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGFMT.STGFMT_STORAGE
member.summary: Indicates that the file must be a compound file.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGFMT.STGFMT_FILE
member.summary: Indicates that the file must not be a compound file.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGFMT.STGFMT_ANY
member.summary: Indicates that the system will determine the file type and use the appropriate structured storage or property set implementation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGFMT.STGFMT_DOCFILE
member.summary: Indicates that the file must be a compound file and is similar to the STGFMT_STORAGE flag, but indicates that the compound-file form of the compound-file implementation must be used.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS
member.summary: Error code which StgOpenStorage method can return after execution.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.S_OK
member.summary: Success code.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.S_FAIL
member.summary: Filed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_ACCESSDENIED
member.summary: Access Denied.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_FILEALREADYEXISTS
member.summary: File already exists.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_FILENOTFOUND
member.summary: File could not be found.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_INSUFFICIENTMEMORY
member.summary: There is insufficient memory available to complete operation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_INVALIDFLAG
member.summary: Invalid flag error.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_INVALIDFUNCTION
member.summary: Unable to perform requested operation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_INVALIDHANDLE
member.summary: Attempted an operation on an invalid object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_INVALIDNAME
member.summary: The name is not valid.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_INVALIDPOINTER
member.summary: Invalid pointer error.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_LOCKVIOLATION
member.summary: A lock violation has occurred.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_NOTSIMPLEFORMAT
member.summary: The compound file was not created with the STGM_SIMPLE flag.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_OLDDLL
member.summary: The compound file was produced with a newer version of storage.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_OLDFORMAT
member.summary: The compound file was produced with an incompatible version of storage.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_PATHNOTFOUND
member.summary: The path could not be found.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_SHAREVIOLATION
member.summary: A share violation has occurred.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STG_ERRORS.STG_E_TOOMANYOPENFILES
member.summary: There are insufficient resources to open another file.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGC
member.summary: The STGC enumeration constants specify the conditions for performing the commit operation in the IStorage::Commit and IStream::Commit methods.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGC.STGC_DEFAULT
member.summary: You can specify this condition with STGC_CONSOLIDATE or some combination of the other three flags in this list of elements.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGC.STGC_OVERWRITE
member.summary: The commit operation can overwrite existing data to reduce overall space requirements.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGC.STGC_ONLYIFCURRENT
member.summary: Prevents multiple users of a storage object from overwriting each other's changes.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGC.STGC_DANGEROUSLYCOMMITMERELYTODISKCACHE
member.summary: Commits the changes to a write-behind disk cache, but does not save the cache to the disk.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.CompoundFile.Presentation.Net.STGC.STGC_CONSOLIDATE
member.summary: Microsoft Windows 2000/XP: Indicates that a storage should be consolidated after it is committed, resulting in a smaller file on disk.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISections
member.Summary: Specifies a collection of sections in a presentation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISections.Add
member.summary: Adds a new section at the last index position and returns the instance of the newly created section.
member.returns: Returns the instance.

example.code: 'Creates a PowerPoint presentation Dim presentation__1 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Adds a section to the PowerPoint presentation Dim section As ISection = presentation__1.Sections.Add() 'Sets a name to the created section section.Name = "SectionDemo" 'Adds a slide to the created section Dim slide As ISlide = section.AddSlide(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Adds a text box to the slide slide.AddTextBox(10, 10, 100, 100).TextBody.AddParagraph("Slide in SectionDemo") 'Saves the PowerPoint presentation presentation__1.Save("Section.pptx")

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISections.Clear
member.summary: Removes all the sections in the presentation.

example.code: 'Creates a PowerPoint presentation Dim presentation__1 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Adds a section to the PowerPoint presentation Dim section As ISection = presentation__1.Sections.Add() 'Adds a slide to the created section Dim slide As ISlide = section.AddSlide(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Removes the sections presentation.Sections.Clear() 'Adds a text box to the slide slide.AddTextBox(10, 10, 100, 100).TextBody.AddParagraph("Slide in SectionDemo") 'Saves the PowerPoint presentation presentation__1.Save("Section.pptx")

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISections.Count

example.code: 'Creates a PowerPoint presentation Dim presentation__1 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Adds a section to the PowerPoint presentation Dim section1 As ISection = presentation__1.Sections.Add() 'Adds a section to the PowerPoint presentation Dim section2 As ISection = presentation__1.Sections.Add() 'Adds a slide to the created section Dim slide As ISlide = section.AddSlide(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Insert a section at the specified index presentation.Sections.Insert(0,section2) 'Adds a text box to the slide slide.AddTextBox(10, 10, 100, 100).TextBody.AddParagraph("Slide in SectionDemo") 'Saves the PowerPoint presentation presentation__1.Save("Section.pptx")

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISection
member.Summary: Specifies a section in the presentation

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISection.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the specified section.
member.Remark: One or more sections may share a same name within the presentation.

example.code: 'Creates a PowerPoint presentation Dim presentation__1 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Adds a section to the PowerPoint presentation Dim section As ISection = presentation__1.Sections.Add() 'Sets a name to the created section section.Name = "SectionDemo" 'Adds a slide to the created section Dim slide As ISlide = section.AddSlide(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Adds a text box to the slide slide.AddTextBox(10, 10, 100, 100).TextBody.AddParagraph("Slide in SectionDemo") 'Saves the PowerPoint presentation presentation__1.Save("Section.pptx")

member.summary: Inserts an element into the slide collection at the specified index within the section.
member.param: The zero-based index at which the section should be inserted.
The section instance to be inserted.

example.code: 'Creates a PowerPoint presentation Dim presentation__1 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Adds a section to the PowerPoint presentation Dim section As ISection = presentation__1.Sections.Add() 'Sets a name to the created section section.Name = "SectionDemo" 'Adds a slide to the created section Dim slide1 As ISlide = section.AddSlide(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Adds a slide to the created section Dim slide2 As ISlide = section.AddSlide(SlideLayoutType.Blank) //Insert a slide at the specified index section.InsertSlide(0,slide2); 'Adds a text box to the slide slide1.AddTextBox(10, 10, 100, 100).TextBody.AddParagraph("Slide in SectionDemo") 'Saves the PowerPoint presentation presentation__1.Save("Section.pptx")

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISection.Clone
member.summary: Creates an independent copy of instance.
member.returns: Returns the instance.

example.code: 'Creates a PowerPoint presentation1 Dim presentation1 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Creates a PowerPoint presentation2 Dim presentation2 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Adds a section to the PowerPoint presentation Dim section As ISection = presentation1.Sections.Add() 'Adds a slide to the created section Dim slide As ISlide = section.AddSlide(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Adds a text box to the slide slide.AddTextBox(10, 10, 100, 100).TextBody.AddParagraph("Slide in SectionDemo") 'Clones the slides in 3rd section Dim slides As ISlides = presentation.Sections(1).Clone() 'Iterates the cloned slides and adds the slides to the destination presentation For Each slide1 As ISlide In slides presentation2.Slides.Add(slide1) Next 'Saves the PowerPoint presentation presentation2.Save("Section.pptx")

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart
member.summary: Represents the charts in the presentation

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.ChartType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Chart Type. Initiate series, ranges and update the ChartType.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 700, 500) 'Specify the chart title chart.ChartTitle = "Sales Analysis" 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Specify the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Surface_3D 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the data range of the category axis chart.PrimaryCategoryAxis.CategoryLabels = chart.ChartData(2, 1, 4, 1) 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.DataRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataRange for the chart series.

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Shapes.AddChart(100, 120, 500, 300) 'Sets the data range of chart chart.DataRange = chart.ChartData(1, 2, 4, 3) 'Set data to the chart- RowIndex, columnIndex and data chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, 330) chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, 490) chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, 700) chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Area 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.IsSeriesInRows
member.summary: Gets or sets whether series in rows or not. True if series are in rows in DataRange; False otherwise.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.ChartTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Title of the chart.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 700, 500) 'Specify the chart title chart.ChartTitle = "Sales Analysis" 'Specify the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_Clustered 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the data range of the category axis chart.PrimaryCategoryAxis.CategoryLabels = chart.ChartData(2, 1, 4, 1) 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.ChartTitleArea
member.summary: Gets title text area. Read-only.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 700, 500) 'Specify the chart title chart.ChartTitle = "Sales Analysis" 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Specify the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Surface_3D 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the data range of the category axis chart.PrimaryCategoryAxis.CategoryLabels = chart.ChartData(2, 1, 4, 1) 'Get the chart title text area Dim textArea As IOfficeChartTextArea = chart.ChartTitleArea 'Set the background mode of the title area textArea.BackgroundMode = OfficeChartBackgroundMode.Transparent 'Set bold font style textArea.Bold = True 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.XPos
member.summary: Gets or sets the X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the chart in points (1/72 inch).

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the x - position of the chart chart.XPos = 300 'Set the y - position of the chart chart.YPos = 140 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

example.code: 'Open the presentation Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Sample.pptx") 'Get the first slide Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart in slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'Modify the chart height chart.Height = 500 'Modify the chart width chart.Width = 700 'Change the title chart.ChartTitle = "New title" 'Change the serie name of first chart serie chart.Series(0).Name = "Modified serie name" 'Hiding the category labels chart.CategoryLabelLevel = OfficeCategoriesLabelLevel.CategoriesLabelLevelNone 'Show Data Table. chart.HasDataTable = True 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.SecondaryCategoryAxis

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.ChartArea
member.summary: Gets an object that represents the complete chart area for the chart. Read-only.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Shapes.AddChart(100, 100, 400, 300) 'Set the chart data value chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "1") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "A") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, 20) 'Set chart data range chart.DataRange = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 4) 'Set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_Clustered 'Get the chart area Dim chartArea As IOfficeChartFrameFormat = chart.ChartArea 'Set the line pattern of chart border chartArea.Border.LinePattern = OfficeChartLinePattern.DashDotDot 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.PlotArea
member.summary: Gets plot area frame format. Read-only.

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Shapes.AddChart(100, 120, 500, 300) 'Sets the data range of chart chart.DataRange = chart.ChartData(1, 2, 4, 3) 'Set data to the chart- RowIndex, columnIndex and data chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, 330) chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, 490) chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, 700) chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Area 'Edge: Specifies that the width or Height will be interpreted as right or bottom of the chart element 'Factor: Specifies that the width or Height will be interpreted as the width or height of the chart element chart.PlotArea.Layout.LeftMode = LayoutModes.auto chart.PlotArea.Layout.TopMode = LayoutModes.factor 'Value in points should not be a negative value if LayoutMode is Edge 'It can be a negative value if the LayoutMode is Factor. chart.ChartTitleArea.Layout.Left = 10 chart.ChartTitleArea.Layout.Top = 100 'Manually positioning chart plot area chart.PlotArea.Layout.LayoutTarget = LayoutTargets.outer chart.PlotArea.Layout.LeftMode = LayoutModes.edge chart.PlotArea.Layout.TopMode = LayoutModes.edge 'Manually positioning chart legend chart.Legend.Layout.LeftMode = LayoutModes.factor chart.Legend.Layout.TopMode = LayoutModes.factor 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.Walls
member.summary: Gets the chart walls. Read-only.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Set the fill type of wall as pattern chart.Walls.Fill.FillType = OfficeFillType.Pattern 'set the back color of the pattern fill chart.Walls.Fill.BackColor = Color.AliceBlue 'Set the fore color of the pattern fill chart.Walls.Fill.ForeColor = Color.Brown 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.SideWall

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.BackWall
member.summary: Gets the chart BackWall. Read-only.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 700, 500) 'Specify the chart title chart.ChartTitle = "Sales Analysis" 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the data range of the category axis chart.PrimaryCategoryAxis.CategoryLabels = chart.ChartData(2, 1, 4, 1) 'Specify the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Surface_3D 'Get the back wall of the chart Dim backWall As IOfficeChartWallOrFloor = chart.BackWall 'Set the line properties of the back wall backWall.LineProperties.LineWeight = OfficeChartLineWeight.Narrow 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Get the floor of chart Dim floor As IOfficeChartWallOrFloor = chart.Floor 'Set the filltype of floor as pattern fill floor.Fill.FillType = OfficeFillType.Pattern 'Set the back and fore color of the pattern fill floor.Fill.BackColor = Color.Blue floor.Fill.ForeColor = Color.Brown 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.DataTable

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Shapes.AddChart(100, 120, 500, 300) 'Sets the data range of chart chart.DataRange = chart.ChartData(1, 2, 4, 3) 'Set data to the chart- RowIndex, columnIndex and data chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, 330) chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, 490) chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, 700) chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Area 'Edge: Specifies that the width or Height will be interpreted as right or bottom of the chart element 'Factor: Specifies that the width or Height will be interpreted as the width or height of the chart element chart.PlotArea.Layout.LeftMode = LayoutModes.auto chart.PlotArea.Layout.TopMode = LayoutModes.factor 'Value in points should not be a negative value if LayoutMode is Edge 'It can be a negative value if the LayoutMode is Factor. chart.ChartTitleArea.Layout.Left = 10 chart.ChartTitleArea.Layout.Top = 100 'Manually positioning chart plot area chart.PlotArea.Layout.LayoutTarget = LayoutTargets.outer chart.PlotArea.Layout.LeftMode = LayoutModes.edge chart.PlotArea.Layout.TopMode = LayoutModes.edge 'Manually positioning chart legend chart.Legend.Layout.LeftMode = LayoutModes.factor chart.Legend.Layout.TopMode = LayoutModes.factor 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Hide the legend chart.HasLegend = False 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of the 3-D chart view (the rotation of the plot area around the z-axis, in degrees).(0 to 360 degrees).

example.code: 'Open the presentation Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Sample.pptx") 'Get the first slide Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart in slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'Change the chart type to 3D chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Bar_Clustered_3D 'Set the rotation chart.Rotation = 80 'Set the shadow angle chart.SideWall.Shadow.Angle = 60 'Set the backwall border weight chart.BackWall.Border.LineWeight = OfficeChartLineWeight.Narrow 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.Perspective
member.summary: Gets or sets the perspective for the 3-D chart view (0 to 100).

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Set the perspective of chart chart.Perspective = 100 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the chart object according its excel data.

example.code: 'Open a presentation containing charts Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") 'Get the slide from presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart from slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts(0) 'Refresh the chart to set worksheet data to current chart chart.Refresh() 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.HeightPercent
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of a 3-D chart as a percentage of the chart width (between 5 and 500 percent).

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart from slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Set the height percent chart.HeightPercent = 400 'Set the Depth percent chart.DepthPercent = 200 'Set the gap depth of data series chart.GapDepth = 400 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.DepthPercent
member.summary: Gets or sets the depth of a 3-D chart as a percentage of the chart width (between 20 and 2000 percent).

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart from slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Set the height percent chart.HeightPercent = 400 'Set the Depth percent chart.DepthPercent = 200 'Set the gap depth of data series chart.GapDepth = 400 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.GapDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance between the data series in a 3-D chart, as a percentage of the marker width.( 0 - 500 )

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart from slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Set the height percent chart.HeightPercent = 400 'Set the Depth percent chart.DepthPercent = 200 'Set the gap depth of data series chart.GapDepth = 400 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.RightAngleAxes
member.summary: Gets or sets whether if the chart axes are at right angles, independent of chart rotation or elevation.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the right angle axes chart.RightAngleAxes = True 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.AutoScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets whether if Microsoft Excel scales a 3-D chart so that it's closer in size to the equivalent 2-D chart.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the right angle axes chart.RightAngleAxes = True 'Set the auto scaling of chart chart.AutoScaling = True 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.WallsAndGridlines2D
member.summary: Gets or sets if grid lines are drawn two-dimensionally on a 3-D chart.

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Set the 2D gridlines for chart chart.WallsAndGridlines2D = True 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.HasPlotArea
member.summary: Gets or sets whether chart has plot area.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.DisplayBlanksAs
member.summary: Gets or sets the way that blank cells are plotted on a chart.

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart from slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Set the way blank cells to be plotted chart.DisplayBlanksAs = OfficeChartPlotEmpty.Interpolated 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.PlotVisibleOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets whether if only visible cells are plotted. False if both visible and hidden cells are plotted.

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart from slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Hide the plot visiblity of cells chart.PlotVisibleOnly = False 'Hide the chart size with sheet window chart.SizeWithWindow = False 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.SizeWithWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart size matches with the chart sheet window. True if Microsoft Excel resizes the chart to match the size of the chart sheet window. False if the chart size isn't attached to the window size. Applies only to chart sheets.

example.code: Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides(0) 'Get the chart from slide Dim chart As IPresentationChart = TryCast(slide.Shapes(0), IOfficeChart) 'set the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Column_3D 'Hide the plot visiblity of cells chart.PlotVisibleOnly = False 'Hide the chart size with sheet window chart.SizeWithWindow = False 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 500, 300) 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'set the serie name level chart.SeriesNameLevel = OfficeSeriesNameLevel.SeriesNameLevelNone 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IPresentationChart.CategoryLabelLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the category name filter option

example.code: 'Create a presentation instance Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add chart to the slide with position and size Dim chart As IPresentationChart = slide.Charts.AddChart(100, 10, 700, 500) 'Specify the chart title chart.ChartTitle = "Sales Analysis" 'Set chart data - Row1 chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 2, "Jan") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 3, "Feb") chart.ChartData.SetValue(1, 4, "March") 'Set chart data - Row2 chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 1, "2010") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(2, 4, "80") 'Set chart data - Row3 chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 1, "2011") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 2, "80") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(3, 4, "60") 'Set chart data - Row4 chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 1, "2012") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 2, "60") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 3, "70") chart.ChartData.SetValue(4, 4, "80") 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieJan As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Jan") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieJan.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 2, 4, 2) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieFeb As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("Feb") 'Set the data range of chart serie – start row, start column, end row, end column serieFeb.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 3, 4, 3) 'Create a new chart series with the name Dim serieMarch As IOfficeChartSerie = chart.Series.Add("March") 'Set the data range of chart series – start row, start column, end row, end column serieMarch.Values = chart.ChartData(2, 4, 4, 4) 'Set the data range of the category axis chart.PrimaryCategoryAxis.CategoryLabels = chart.ChartData(2, 1, 4, 1) 'Specify the chart type chart.ChartType = OfficeChartType.Surface_3D 'Set the category label level chart.CategoryLabelLevel = OfficeCategoriesLabelLevel.CategoriesLabelLevelAll 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp
member.summary: This class contains constants required for document properties parsing and serialization in Excel 2007 format.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp.CorePropertiesTagName
member.summary: Core properties enable users to get and set well-known and common sets of property metadata within packages.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp.CategoryTagName
member.summary: Represents a categorization of the content of this package.

member.summary: Represents the date of creation of the resource.

member.summary: Represents an entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource.

member.summary: Represents an explanation of the content of the resource.

member.summary: Represents a delimited set of keywords to support searching and indexing.

member.summary: Represents the date and time of the last printing.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp.ModifiedTagName
member.summary: Represents the date on which the resource was changed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp.SubjectTagName
member.summary: Represents the topic of the content of the resource.

member.summary: Represents Xsi attribute value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp.ApplicationSpecificFilePropertiesTagName
member.summary: This element specifies the application properties of a document.

member.summary: This element specifies the name of the application that created this document.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp.TotalNumberOfCharacters
member.summary: This element specifies the total number of characters in a document.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.DocProp.NameOfCompanyTagName

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM
member.summary: The STGM enumeration values are used in the IStorage, IStream, and IPropertySetStorage interfaces. These elements are often combined using an OR operator.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_READ
member.summary: Indicates that the object is read-only, meaning that modifications cannot be made.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_WRITE
member.summary: STGM_WRITE lets you save changes to the object, but does not permit access to its data.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_READWRITE
member.summary: STGM_READWRITE allows you to both access and modify an object's data.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_SHARE_DENY_NONE
member.summary: Specifies that subsequent openings of the object are not denied read or write access. If no flag from the sharing group is specified, this flag is assumed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_SHARE_DENY_READ
member.summary: Prevents others from subsequently opening the object in STGM_READ mode. It is typically used on a root storage object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_SHARE_DENY_WRITE
member.summary: Prevents others from subsequently opening the object for STGM_WRITE or STGM_READWRITE access.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_SHARE_EXCLUSIVE
member.summary: Prevents others from subsequently opening the object in any mode. In transacted mode, sharing of STGM_SHARE_DENY_WRITE or STGM_SHARE_EXCLUSIVE can significantly improve performance since they don't require snapshotting.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_PRIORITY
member.summary: Opens the storage object with exclusive access to the most recently committed version.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_CREATE
member.summary: Indicates that an existing storage object or stream should be removed before the new one replaces it.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_CONVERT
member.summary: Creates the new object while preserving existing data in a stream named "Contents".

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_FAILIFTHERE
member.summary: Causes the create operation to fail if an existing object with the specified name exists.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_DIRECT
member.summary: In direct mode, each change to a storage or stream element is written as it occurs.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_TRANSACTED
member.summary: In transacted mode, changes are buffered and written only if an explicit commit operation is called.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_NOSCRATCH
member.summary: In transacted mode, a temporary scratch file is usually used to save modifications until the Commit method is called.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_NOSNAPSHOT
member.summary: This flag is used when opening a storage object with STGM_TRANSACTED and without STGM_SHARE_EXCLUSIVE or STGM_SHARE_DENY_WRITE.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_SIMPLE
member.summary: STGM_SIMPLE is a mode that provides a much faster implementation of a compound file in a limited, but frequently used case.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_DIRECT_SWMR
member.summary: The STGM_DIRECT_SWMR supports direct mode for single-writer, multireader file operations.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Presentation.STGM.STGM_DELETEONRELEASE
member.summary: Indicates that the underlying file is to be automatically destroyed when the root storage object is released.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Drawing.Shape.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of degrees the specified shape is rotated.
member.remarks: The rotation value ranges from -3600 degrees to 3600 degrees.
member.value: The rotation angle of the shape.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation__1 As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation__1.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add a rectangle to the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Rectangle, 100, 100, 100, 100) 'Set the rotation value to the shape instance. shape.Rotation = 300 'Save the presentation presentation__1.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation__1.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.FromArgb(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an structure from a 32-bit ARGB value.
member.param: A value specifying the 32-bit ARGB value.
member.returns: The structure this method creates.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Set the color for solid fill slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color = ColorObject.FromArgb(146880); 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.FromArgb(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an structure from the four ARGB component (alpha, red, green, and blue) values.
member.param: The alpha component. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The red component. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The green component. Valid values are 0 through 255.
The blue component. Valid values are 0 through 255.
member.returns: The structure this method creates.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Set the argb value for solid fill slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color = ColorObject.FromArgb(90, 120, 120, 120); 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.FromArgb(System.Int32,Syncfusion.Presentation.IColor)
member.summary: Creates an structure from the specified structure combined with the new alpha value.
member.param: The alpha value for the new . Valid values are 0 through 255.
The instance from which to create the new color.
member.returns: The structure this method creates.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Set the color for solid fill slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color = ColorObject.FromArgb(30, ColorObject.Red); 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.FromArgb(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an structure from the specified RGB values (red, green, and blue). The alpha value is implicitly 255 (fully opaque).
member.param: The red component value for the new . Valid values are 0 through 255.
The green component value for the new . Valid values are 0 through 255.
The blue component value for the new . Valid values are 0 through 255.
member.returns: The structure this method creates.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Set the rgb value for solid fill slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color = ColorObject.FromArgb(120, 120, 120); 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.FromKnownColor(Syncfusion.Presentation.KnownColor)
member.summary: Creates an structure from the specified predefined color.
member.param: An element of the enumeration.
member.returns: The structure this method creates.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Open("Template.pptx") 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Set the color of solid Fill slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color = ColorObject.FromKnownColor(System.Drawing.KnownColor.ActiveBorder) 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'Close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.GetBrightness
member.summary: Returns the hue-saturation-brightness (HSB) brightness value for the specified structure.
member.returns: The brightness of this color. The brightness ranges from 0.0 through 1.0, where 0.0 represents black and 1.0 represents white.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape to the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Dodecagon, 234, 23, 120, 100) 'Set the fill type of shape shape.Fill.FillType = FillType.Pattern 'Set the back color of the pattern fill shape.Fill.PatternFill.BackColor = ColorObject.Red 'Create an instance for color object Dim colorObject As ColorObject = TryCast(slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color, ColorObject) 'Get the brightness of color, it is read only Dim brightness As Single = colorObject.GetBrightness() 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.GetHue
member.summary: Returns the hue-saturation-brightness (HSB) hue value, in degrees.
member.returns: The hue, in degrees, of the specified color. The hue is measured in degrees, ranging from 0.0 through 360.0, in HSB color space.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape to the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Dodecagon, 234, 23, 120, 100) 'Set the fill type of shape shape.Fill.FillType = FillType.Pattern 'Set the back color of the pattern fill shape.Fill.PatternFill.BackColor = ColorObject.Red 'Create an instance for color object Dim colorObject As ColorObject = TryCast(slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color, ColorObject) 'Get the hue of color, it is read only Dim hue As Single = colorObject.GetHue() 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.GetSaturation
member.summary: Returns the hue-saturation-brightness (HSB) saturation value.
member.returns: The saturation of the specified color. The saturation ranges from 0.0 through 1.0, where 0.0 is gray-scale and 1.0 is the most saturated.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape to the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Dodecagon, 234, 23, 120, 100) 'Set the fill type of shape shape.Fill.FillType = FillType.Pattern 'Set the back color of the pattern fill shape.Fill.PatternFill.BackColor = ColorObject.Red 'Create an instance for color object Dim colorObject As ColorObject = TryCast(slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color, ColorObject) 'Get the saturation of color, it is read only Dim saturation As Single = colorObject.GetSaturation() 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.ToArgb
member.summary: Gets the 32-bit ARGB value of this structure.
member.returns: The 32-bit Argb value of this color.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape to the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Dodecagon, 234, 23, 120, 100) 'Set the fill type of shape shape.Fill.FillType = FillType.Pattern 'Set the back color of the pattern fill shape.Fill.PatternFill.BackColor = ColorObject.Red 'Create an instance for color object Dim colorObject As ColorObject = TryCast(slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color, ColorObject) 'Convert to the argb value Dim argb As Integer = colorObject.ToArgb() 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'close the presentation presentation.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.ColorObject.ToKnownColor
member.summary: Gets the value of the structure.
member.returns: An element of the enumeration.

example.code: 'Create a new presentation. Dim presentation As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a blank slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = presentation.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape to the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Dodecagon, 234, 23, 120, 100) 'Set the fill type of shape shape.Fill.FillType = FillType.Pattern 'Set the pattern type shape.Fill.PatternFill.Pattern = PatternFillType.DarkDownwardDiagonal 'Set the back color of the pattern fill shape.Fill.PatternFill.BackColor = ColorObject.Red 'Create an instance for color object Dim colorObject As ColorObject = TryCast(slide.Background.Fill.SolidFill.Color, ColorObject) 'Convert to known color Dim knownColor As System.Drawing.KnownColor = colorObject.ToKnownColor() 'Save the presentation presentation.Save("Output.pptx") 'close the presentation presentation.Close()
